data.name: Ring of Yaxche
data.passiveDescription: Using an Elemental Skill grants the Jade-Forged Crown effect: Every 1,000 Max HP will increase the Normal Attack DMG dealt by the equipping character by {{0.6//0.7//0.8//0.9//1%}} for 10s. Normal Attack DMG can be increased this way by a maximum of {{16//20//24//28//32%}}.
